item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Niantic announces “Large Geospatial Model” trained on Pokémon Go player data (250 points | 205 comments)
2. What is the origin of the lake tank image that has become a meme? (2021) (506 points | 109 comments)
3. Building Databases over a Weekend (38 points | 3 comments)
4. Show HN: We open-sourced our compost monitoring tech (28 points | 6 comments)
5. Electrobun: Cross-platform desktop applications written in TypeScript (46 points | 13 comments)
6. Weight-loss drug found to shrink heart muscle in mice, human cells (161 points | 172 comments)
7. Mathematical Thinking Isn't What You Think It Is (11 points | 1 comment)
8. Z-Library Helps Students to Overcome Academic Poverty, Study Finds (175 points | 36 comments)
9. AAA – Analytical Anti-Aliasing (477 points | 71 comments)
10. AlphaQubit: AI to identify errors in Quantum Computers (96 points | 41 comments)
11. Doxx/Darkflare: DarkFlare TCPoCDN (TCP over CDN) (40 points | 5 comments)
12. Undergraduates with family income below $200k will be tuition-free at MIT (401 points | 290 comments)
13. Fashion History Timeline (10 points | 1 comment)
14. Vapi (YC W21) Is Hiring Founding Senior Engineer (Front End) ( | hide)
15. SQL, Homomorphisms and Constraint Satisfaction Problems (118 points | 10 comments)
16. New Calculation Finds we are close to the Kessler Syndrome [video] (61 points | 60 comments)
17. Show HN: Autotab – Programmable AI browser for turning web tasks into APIs (68 points | 38 comments)
18. How good are American roads? (172 points | 379 comments)
19. Bit-twiddling optimizations in Zed's Rope (95 points | 33 comments)
20. Google stops letting sites like Forbes rule search for "Best CBD Gummies" (187 points | 111 comments)
21. Does the Internet Route Around Damage? – Baltic Sea Cable Cuts (48 points | 10 comments)
22. Gregglogger (12 points | 4 comments)
23. Apple fights to keep DOJ antitrust suit from reaching trial (53 points | 28 comments)
24. Pipe Viewer – A Unix Utility You Should Know About (123 points | 25 comments)
25. Between the Booms: AI in Winter – Communications of the ACM (57 points | 35 comments)
26. Exploring the Cost and Feasibility of Battery-Electric Ships (27 points | 55 comments)
27. Science Talk – What Are Pulsar Planets? (2022) (3 points | discuss)
28. Bird flu in Canada may have mutated to become more transmissible to humans (69 points | 29 comments)
29. Europe's Internet resilience mitigates impact of submarine cable cuts (108 points | 22 comments)
30. Show HN: Cardo ‒ Open Source desktop podcast client (78 points | 28 comments)
